column1: 产品结构：当前位置：首页->芯片及方案->Hi2610H7芯片

column4: LS232 CPU（MIPS 兼容），32bit，800Mhz，16KB ICACHE+16KB DCACHE，On-chip SRAM：8KB，Little Endian，EJTAG Debugger，Interrupt controller，Timer equipment，Timer，Watch Dog，RTC，SPI FLASH，50Mhz，2bits read mode，DDR2/3 SDRAM，16bit，1066M data rate，Auto Refresh and Self Refresh，256×16Mbit，Peripheral interface，General purpose IO（GPIO），Serial port（UART），Infrared receiver，PWM，JTAG，SC（smart card），SD card，USB 2.0/PVR，ETHERNET MAC，DEMUX，Receive 2 transport streams，the rate is up to 135Mbps，Support 64 channels，48 filters. Channel 0~15 can realize descrambling function and the filters can be configured dynamically，embedded DVBC module，ADVANCED SECURITY，embedded OTP，embedded AES/3DES/SMS4 algorithm module，security BOOT，CW protected，JTAG protected，DDR obfuscation，VIDEO decoder，JPEG baseline and progressive，resolution 8000x8000，H264 HP@L4.1，ISO/IEC 13818-2（MPEG-2）MP@HL，AVS JP@L6.0，AVS PLUS，MPEG4 ASP@L5.0（H263/xVID/VIDX compatible），Error detect and recovery，Zoom-in and zoom-out，AUDIO DSP，Audio：ISO/IEC 11172-3，layer 1 and 2，IEC958/IEC937 digital audio out，SPDIF out，GRAPHIC AND DISPLAY，5 display planes，CLUT8，ACLUT88，RGB565，RGB888，ARGB1555，ARGB4444，ARGB6666，ARGB8888 formats，Alpha blending，antiflicker filters，PPU/2D graphic accelerate，Digital video output：compliant with CCIR 601/CCIR 656 or RGB666，True-color logo screen，VIDEO OUT，RGB，CVBS，Y/C and YPbPr out with four 10-bit DAC，HDMI1.4 with HDCP 1.3，Macrovision，CVBS out with YPbPr/HDMI HDTV out
